sentence.Network_en: Something dropped on the floor and rolled beneath the valance of the bed.
sentence.Network_cn: 有一样东西掉到地板上又滚到床沿挂布的下面.

sentence.Network_en: The handle of the telltale teaspoon was visible under the bed - valance.
sentence.Network_cn: 因为说明问题的那把汤匙已暴露在床帷下.

sentence.Network_en: The iron rod supports the valance is bent in an arc.
sentence.Network_cn: 挂窗帘上部短幔的铁棍弯成了个弓形.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: perhaps Anglo-Norman French, from a shortened form of Old French avaler 'descend' (see vail)

entry.tran: （装饰床沿的）挂布，挂帘，短帷幔
entry.def: A valance is a piece of cloth that hangs down over the sides of a bed in order to make it look nice.
A valance is a long narrow piece of wood or fabric which is fitted at the top of a window for decoration and to hide the curtain rail.

means.word_mean: 1. a decorative framework to conceal curtain fixtures at the top of a window casing
